member.name: F:AppliedSystems.Collections.Constants.NotFound
member.summary: Constant which indicates that an element was not found in a collection.

member.name: M:AppliedSystems.Collections.EnumerableExtensions.SequenceInvariantHashCode``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Extension method which generates a hascode from the elements of a sequence. The hashcode generated will be the same if the sequences contain the same elements regardless of the order.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence.
member.param: The sequence to generate the hashcode of.
member.returns: A hashcode based on the elements in the sequence, independent of the order of the elements.

member.name: M:AppliedSystems.Collections.EnumerableExtensions.SequenceHashCode``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Extension method which generates a hascode from the elements of a sequence. The hashcode generated will be different if the sequences contain the same elements but in a different order.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the sequence.
member.param: The sequence to generate the hashcode of.
member.returns: A hashcode based on the elements and their order in the sequence.

member.name: M:AppliedSystems.Collections.EnumerableExtensions.ExistsAndIsNotEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Extension method that determines if a sequence is not null and contains elements.
member.returns: True, if the collection is not null and not empty; False otherwise.

member.name: M:AppliedSystems.Collections.EnumerableExtensions.DoesNotExistsOrIsEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Extension method that determines if a sequence is either null or contains no elements.
member.returns: True, if the collection is either null or empty; False otherwise.
